title: Social Problem-Solving Competency Strengthening Through Failure Case-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social studies knowledge and proficiency in using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Asynchronous online course in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments for novice social studies learners, focusing on developing critical thinking and problem-solving skills through failure case analysis

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three or more causes of failure in diverse social issue cases.
Learners can propose realistic alternatives based on lessons derived from failure cases.
Learners can reflect on and improve their decision-making processes through expert feedback.
Learners can develop a growth mindset that transforms failure experiences into learning opportunities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
